body_html:
Transformer is a large concept and there are a lot variants applied to different tasks in the field of NLP.
Adding layers (e.g. nn.SelfAttention, nn.SinusoidalPositionalEncoding, nn.FeedForwardLayer) maybe makes more sense.

body:
Transformer is a large concept and there are a lot variants applied to different tasks in the field of NLP.
Adding layers (e.g. nn.SelfAttention, nn.SinusoidalPositionalEncoding, nn.FeedForwardLayer) maybe makes more sense.
